name: Breaking Bricks (Stealthness)
description:
Thank you for looking at my game.

I just started to learn unity and game development, and there are many bugs and gameplay has not been polished. I set myself a week to complete and polish as much as I could and publish the game as it stood, warts and all. The goal of the project was to complete making a game and to publish it on Itch.io. 

I welcome any constructive feedback.

This game was developed by following the YouTube course below.

Other thanks to free assets that I used

Music and Sounds - Asset Store - Enormous 8bit sounds pack

Font - M12_MACH BIKER
